QuestData.Title: Which Berries? Witchberries.
QuestData.Description: That young'un over there, Andi, is going to grow up to be a heck of a farmer some day. I can tell just by lookin' at him.$b$bI think I'll plant him some witchberries. Kids love witchberries - it'll be a nice surprise.
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant Witchberries in Sunsong Ranch. You can purchase seeds from Merchant Greenfield in the Halfhill Market.
